tab.title: See how Neuro is changing lives

review_list.review_text: Neuro has been a game-changer for me! I've been using it for a few months now, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my energy levels and overall vitality. It's amazing how something so simple can have such profound effects. Highly recommend!

I've struggled with maintaining hormone balance for years, but Neuro has made a world of difference. Not only do I feel more balanced and energized, but I've also noticed improvements in my skin tone and muscle tone. It's truly remarkable!

product_benefits.title: Experience the transformative benefits of Neuro
product_benefits.desc: Unlock your cognitive potential and achieve peak mental performance with Neuro’s powerful blend. Whether you need to enhance focus, boost mental energy, or support long-term brain health, Neuro is your ultimate ally.

items_left.title: Sustained Release
items_left.desc: Oral administration allows for a more consistent and sustained release of glutathione into the bloodstream.

items_left.title: Enhanced Bioavailability
items_left.desc: Nano-sized glutathione particles mean a greater proportion of glutathione is utilized, maximizing its antioxidant benefits.

items_right.title: Convenience
items_right.desc: Unparalleled convenience compared to the more invasive and time-consuming IV treatments.

items_right.title: Cost-Effectiveness
items_right.desc: A more affordable alternative to regular IV glutathione treatments. Eliminate the need for frequent clinic visits, reducing overall costs.

product_post_list.title: Innovative science
product_post_list.desc: Glutathione is the protector and detoxifier of the cell. It’s the key to the life, health, performance, protection and longevity of every human cell.

product_post_list.title: HydraStat™ nanotechnology
product_post_list.desc: Nano-sized particles protected by ultra-pure water clusters. Our nanosized ingredients are small enough to be fully absorbed into the human cell.

product_post_list.title: Purity and quality
product_post_list.desc: Neuro undergoes rigorous third-party testing to ensure it meets the highest standards of purity and quality. We stand behind our product with a 30-day money-back guarantee, confident in its ability to deliver significant health benefits.

key_ingredients.title: Key ingredients in Neuro
key_ingredients.ingredients: other key ingredients: CAFFEINE, MAGNESIUM GLUCONATE, ALPHA GPC, ACETYL-L-CARNITINE, MSM, PYRIDOXAL 5-PHOSPHATE. *IMAGE SHOWS A PLANT/FOOD IN WHICH THE ACTIVE INGREDIENT IS FOUND AND NOT NECESSARILY WHERE it is EXTRACTed FROM.

how_to_use.title: Directions for use
how_to_use.desc: To experience the full benefits, swish the recommended dosage of Neuro in your mouth for 30 seconds before swallowing. This method ensures optimal absorption of the nano-formulated ingredients.

items.desc: Glutathione is able to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their harmful effects.It also helps to reduce inflammation, and supports the body's natural ability to fight off infection.In addition, it plays a role in the synthesis of new immune cells, keeping your immune system functioning at its best.

items.header: Enhanced Quality and Length of Life

cta.desc: Unlock your cognitive capabilities and achieve peak mental performance with Neuro, your daily dose of brain health in a bottle.
